text: Chisom Promis Dike is a Nigerian lawmaker representing Eleme, Tai and Oyigbo federal constituency of Rivers State at the House of Representatives. Dike, a member of the People's Democratic Party (PDP) was a state legislator representing Oyigbo constituency at the Rivers State House of Assembly before winning the National Assembly election in 2019. After his inauguration as a federal lawmaker, Dike moved a motion for investigating a fire outbreak along the NNPC pipeline in Kom Kom and lzuoma communities of Oyigbo Local Government Area of Rivers. The lawmakers adopted the motion and set up an ad-hoc committee to probe the incident. == References == Category:Living people Category:People's Democratic Party (Nigeria) politicians Category:Members of the House of Representatives (Nigeria) from Rivers State Category:21st-century Nigerian politicians Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Chisom Dike
